Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Attributes patient_age and patient_gender Crucial Identifiers It is highly unlikely that two different patients with the exact same age and gender are being processed simultaneously in the same context within this short timeframe additional_info Provides context

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Initial Scan for Unique Identifiers Lets look at the patient_age and patient_gender combinations in the list 45 M 62 F 28 M There are exactly three unique combinations This strongly suggests there are 3 distinct cases

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
